quote: In the last two decades, our nation has lost a third of its manufacturing jobs, and our business tax is one of the highest in the world.  It actually is, of developed countries, the single highest tax anywhere in the world.
quotePlain: In the last two decades, our nation has lost a third of its manufacturing jobs, and our business tax is one of the highest in the world.  It actually is, of developed countries, the single highest tax anywhere in the world.
name: Donald Trump

claims.title: the US has the highest corporate tax rate in the developed world
claims.negative: the US does not have the highest corporate tax rate in the developed world
claims.negativePlain: the US does not have the highest corporate tax rate in the developed world
claims.truth: The US does have a high *statutory* rate (up to 35%), but significant deductions and exemptions mean companies actually end up paying a much lower rate; the *effective* tax rate is about average. Furthermore, while the statutory rate is relatively high, it is not the highest in the developed world; that distinction goes to the United Arab Emirates with rates up to 55%.
